code: "use client";import React from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const fakultasData=[{value:"filkom",label:"Fakultas Ilmu Komputer"},{value:"feb",label:"Fakultas Ekonomi dan Bisnis"},{value:"fekep",label:"Fakultas Keperawatan"},{value:"fkip",label:"Fakultas Ilmu Kependidikan"},{value:"fil",label:"Fakultas Filsafat"},{value:"teknik",label:"Fakultas Teknik"}];const jurusanData={filkom:[{value:"informatika",label:"Informatika"},{value:"sistem_informasi",label:"Sistem Informasi"}],feb:[{value:"akuntansi",label:"Akuntansi"},{value:"manajemen",label:"Manajemen"}],fekep:[{value:"keperawatan",label:"Keperawatan"}],fkip:[{value:"pendidikan_bahasa",label:"Pendidikan Bahasa"}],fil:[{value:"teologi",label:"Teologi"}],teknik:[{value:"teknik_sipil",label:"Teknik Sipil"},{value:"arsitektur",label:"Arsitektur"}]};const InputOption=_ref=>{let{type,value,onChange,selectedFakultas}=_ref;const getOptions=()=>{if(type==="fakultas"){return fakultasData;}else if(type==="jurusan"&&selectedFakultas){return jurusanData[selectedFakultas]||[];}return[];};const options=getOptions();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:value,onChange:onChange,style:{width:"655px",height:"35px",fontSize:"16px",fontFamily:"Onest, -apple-system, Roboto, Helvetica, sans-serif",color:"#020202",borderRadius:"6px",border:"1px solid #a19999",padding:"5px 10px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{value:"",children:["Pilih ",type]}),options.map((option,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:option.value,children:option.label},index))]});};export default InputOption;
